verses.verse: Now the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> more <S%H6175>subtle<s%> than any <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%>, <S%H637>Yes<s%>, has <S%H430>God<s%> really <S%H559>said<s%>, You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of every <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%>?
And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5175>serpent<s%>, We may <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%>:

But of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> which is in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%>, You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H5060>it<s%>, neither shall you touch <S%H6435>it<s%>, lest you <S%H4191>die<s%>.
And the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H802>woman<s%>, You shall not <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>:

For <S%H430>God<s%> does <S%H3045>know<s%> that in the <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H5869>it<s%>, then your eyes shall be <S%H6491>opened<s%>, and you will be as <S%H430>gods<s%>, <S%H3045>knowing<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%>.

And when the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H6086>tree<s%> was <S%H2896>good<s%> for <S%H3978>food<s%>, and that <S%H1931>it<s%> was <S%H8378>pleasant<s%> to the <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and a <S%H6086>tree<s%> to be <S%H2530>desired<s%> to make one <S%H7919>wise<s%>, she <S%H3947>took<s%> of the fruit of <S%H6529>it<s%>, and did <S%H398>eat<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> to her <S%H376>husband<s%> with <S%H398>her<s%>; and he did eat.

And the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of them <S%H8147>both<s%> were <S%H6491>opened<s%>, and <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that they were <S%H5903>naked<s%>; and they <S%H8609>sewed<s%> <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H5929>leaves<s%> <S%H8609>together<s%>, and made <S%H6213>themselves<s%> <S%H2290>aprons<s%>.

And they <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> in the <S%H7307>cool<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%>: and <S%H120>Adam<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> hid <S%H2244>themselves<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto <S%H120>Adam<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H335>him<s%>, Where are you?

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H6963>voice<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%>, and I was <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, because <S%H595>I<s%> was <S%H5903>naked<s%>; and I hid <S%H2244>myself<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> you that you were <S%H5903>naked<s%>? Have you <S%H398>eaten<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> that I commanded <S%H6680>you<s%> that you should <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%>?

And the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H802>woman<s%> whom you <S%H5414>gave<s%> to be with <S%H5978>me<s%>, <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> me of the <S%H6086>tree<s%>, and I did <S%H398>eat<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%>, What is this that you have <S%H6213>done<s%>? And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H5175>serpent<s%> deceived <S%H5377>me<s%>, and I did <S%H398>eat<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5175>serpent<s%>, Because <S%H859>you<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H779>this<s%>, you are cursed above all <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and above every <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>; upon your <S%H1512>belly<s%> shall you <S%H3212>go<s%>, and <S%H6083>dust<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life<s%>:

And I will <S%H7896>put<s%> <S%H342>enmity<s%> between you and the <S%H802>woman<s%>, and between your <S%H2233>seed<s%> and her <S%H2233>seed<s%>; He shall <S%H7779>bruise<s%> your <S%H7218>head<s%>, and you shall <S%H7779>bruise<s%> his <S%H6119>heel<s%>.

To the <S%H802>woman<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H7235>greatly<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> your <S%H6093>pain<s%> in your <S%H2032>pregnancy<s%>; in <S%H6089>sorrow<s%> you shall bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>; and your <S%H8669>desire<s%> shall be to your <S%H376>husband<s%>, and he shall rule over <S%H4910>you<s%>.

And to <S%H121>Adam<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%>, Because you have <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H802>wife<s%>, and have <S%H398>eaten<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree<s%>, of <S%H834>which<s%> I commanded <S%H6680>you<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H779>it<s%>: cursed is the <S%H127>ground<s%> for your <S%H6093>sake<s%>; in sorrow shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> of it <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life<s%>;
Thorns <S%H6975>also<s%> and <S%H1863>thistles<s%> shall it bring <S%H6779>forth<s%> to <S%H398>you<s%>; and you shall eat the <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>;

By the <S%H2188>sweat<s%> of your <S%H639>face<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, <S%H5704>until<s%> you <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H127>ground<s%>; for out of it were you <S%H3947>taken<s%>: for <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H859>you<s%> <S%H6083>are<s%>, and to dust shall you <S%H7725>return<s%>.
And <S%H120>Adam<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H2332>Eve<s%>; because she was the <S%H517>mother<s%> of all <S%H2416>living<s%>.
To <S%H120>Adam<s%> also and to his <S%H802>wife<s%> did the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3801>coats<s%> of <S%H5785>skins<s%>, and clothed <S%H3847>them<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H2005>Behold<s%>, the <S%H120>man<s%> is become as <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H3045>us<s%>, to know <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%>: and <S%H7971>now<s%>, lest he put forth his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> also of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%>, and <S%H2425>live<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>:

Therefore the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> sent him <S%H7971>forth<s%> from the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%>, to <S%H5647>until<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> from which he was <S%H3947>taken<s%>.

So he drove <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%>; and he <S%H7931>placed<s%> at the <S%H6924>east<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> <S%H3742>Cherubims<s%>, and a <S%H3858>flaming<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> which turned every <S%H2015>way<s%>, to <S%H8104>guard<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>.
